testItem.description: An item to be shown in the 'test explorer' view. Can represent either a test suite or a test itself

duration.description: How long the test took to execute, in milliseconds

result.description: The result of running a test. If 'errored' or 'failed', it must have at least one message

message.description: Human readable message text to display. Can use Markdown formatting

location.description: The location associated with the message

actualOutput.description: Actual test output. If given with expectedOutput, a diff view will be shown

expectedOutput.description: Expected test output. If given with actualOutput, a diff view will be shown

range.description: The document range of this location

uri.description: The resource identifier of this location

testId.description: Identifier for the test/group. Must be unique among its parent's direct children

testLabel.description: Display name describing the test case/group

testDescription.description: Optional description that appears next to the label

testSortText.description: A string that should be used when comparing this item with other items. When falsy the label is used

id.description: ID of the test tag. TestTag instances with the same ID are considered to be identical

testUri.description: URI this TestItem is associated with. May be a file or directory

testError.description: Optional error encountered while loading the test. Note that this is not a test result and should only be used to represent errors in test discovery, such as syntax errors
